resources.string: The file was successfully obtained in base64
We are here to provide you with the best experience in security and authenticity. This process helps us verify your identity.

We use AI to know who you are and to ensure that it is really you, always following the highest standards in data protection. 

The facial verification process is very simple and involves scanning your face to ensure you are alive.

We do not store or share your information, we only use the data to guarantee the authenticity of your identity. This process ensures that your personal information is protected and that only you can access your account. 

Let is get started!

We are pleased to inform you that the Liveness process has been successfully completed. We have accurately validated your identity and the documents provided, ensuring a reliable experience. \n\nIf you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
The submitted video indicates you are not human, please try again…
